properties.title: The Trient Gorge
properties.abstract: A 30 minutes walk in this gorge which is crossed by two of the highest bridges of Europe (200 m height).
properties.description: Powerful example of the phenomenon of erosion, it forms a deep incision of a few hundred meters height at the bottom of which runs the glacial torrent. This impressive fault is crossed by two of the highest bridges of Europe which overhang the gorge of 200 m. Easy access.
properties.name: Vernayaz
